title: Drift Escape
description: Drift Escape is an adrenaline-fueled game that pits you as a skilled driver evading police and military chases in a bustling city. Showcase your drifting talents while dodging obstacles and causing pursuers to crash. With realistic graphics and intuitive controls, it offers an immersive urban escape. Master the art of drifting, prove your driving skills, and become the ultimate evasive driver.
